Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project setup: GPU E-commerce Platform documentation and AI workflow

- Add core system specification \(INITIAL.md\) defining the GPU e-commerce
  backend with Users, Auth, Products, and Orders modules
- Add enhanced specification \(ENHANCED-INITIAL-gpu-ecommerce-platform.md\)
  with concrete implementation patterns, database migrations, and
  project structure
- Add AI workflow commands for PRP-based development process
- Include backend requirements and project assignment documentation
- Configure .gitignore for Maven/Spring Boot project

Technology stack: Java 21, Spring Boot 3.x, PostgreSQL, JWT, Flyway,
Testcontainers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
